content.description:
Rex enim et conditorconditor, -toris, m.: founder civitatis huius, de qua loqui 
instituimusinstituo, -ere = coepio, -ere, sententiam legis aperuit.
content.question: In the sentence, to what does qua refer?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
